DOB: July 2001-October 2001<!--Even if born as late as December 31, 2001, Flash would be 16y4.5m old when snapped, plus 8.5m, 17y1m old biologically in Far from Home. The only way he's "16", as said in the film, is if he was born between May and October (so hadn't yet had his birthday when he was snapped and had a long time to go until his birthday when he came back), and also born no earlier than July to have not had his birthday yet in Far from Home. So July-October 2001 to be 16 when snapped and brought back and not yet had another birthday.-->
DOD: Spring 2018 (victim of the Snap; resurrected by Hulk in 2023)
